ygData.subject: Re: Enough about whether it is ok to cheat
ygData.msgSnippet: ... don t like cheats, or think ... them.  I am certain someone ... any cheats posted here ... it is something huge like ... I am not complaining about taking
ygData.messageBody:
---William Hooker <wahooker@...> wrote:
>
> From: "William Hooker" <wahooker@...>
>
> This is an EQ Cheats list. CHEATS LIST. If you
don't like cheats, or think
> it is wrong, unsubscribe. Don't complain about
them. I am certain someone
> from verant is subscribed to this list anyway, so
any cheats posted here
> will likely be stopped soon after posting, unless
it is something huge like
> a MoB pathing problem. or such like that.
>
I am not complaining about taking advantages of the
existing game code. I am not against sharing
information on where rare spawns are, how to get
levels quicker etc. But I AM against hacking the game
code. Although, I was REALLY wanting to get my hands
on EMUQ... not to cheat... but to create my own
little EQ universe.

-Kenny
